panas wasa­rak pura andunu hunu­wa­taya maname natakaya 1956 nowambaraye di rangagathawimath samanga shri lankeya wedika natya wansha kathawe aluthma parichchedayak liyawunu lesama, eeta wasara ekolahakata pamana pasuwa enam 1967 marthu atawana da prathama warata karaliyata pamini hunuwataye kathawa da shri lankeya natya wansha kathawa yali nawathama parichchedayak arambau bawa sathyayaki.
